tool_description: Uma API que mostra todas as últimas notícias sobre o mundo de criptomoedas.
name: NewsCrytpo
title: NewsCrytpo

api_list.name: Get All Cryptocurrency News By ID
api_list.description: Esse endpoint ir retornar todas as notícias sobre Criptomoedas de um único jornal.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newscrytpo.p.rapidapi.com/moneytimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newscrytpo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://newscrytpo.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newscrytpo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
